OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.amount: The amount of Metis tokens that have been minted.

params.newValue: The address of the new sequencer agent template.
params.oldValue: The address of the old sequencer agent template.

params.amount: The amount of Metis tokens that have been added to the lock.
params.index: The index of the sequencer agent in the sequencer list.
params.reward: The amount of additional rewards that have been locked.

returns._0: The index of the new sequencer agent.

params.agentId: The index of the sequencer agent.
params.amount: The amount of Metis tokens to lock.
params.sequencerSigner: The address of the sequencer signer.
params.signerPubKey: The public key of the sequencer signer.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

relock().details: The `relock` function will transfer Metis tokens from the Dealer contract to the sequencer agent contract, and then call the `relock` function on the sequencer agent contract.

returns.totalProcessed: The total amount of Metis tokens and rewards that have been relocked.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setL2Gas(uint32).details: The L2 gas limit is used when minting eMetis tokens on Layer 2.

params._sequencerAgentTemplate: The address of the new sequencer agent template.

params._withdrawRewards: The new value of the withdrawRewards flag.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.agentId: The index of the sequencer agent.
The index of the sequencer agent.

L2GasSet(uint32,uint32).notice: Emits when the L2 gas limit is set.

L2MetisMinted(uint256).notice: Emits when Metis tokens are minted on Layer 2.

SequencerAgentAdded(uint32,address).notice: Emits when a new sequencer agent is added

SequencerAgentTemplateSet(address,addres.notice: Emits when the sequencer agent template is set.

SequencerRelocked(uint32,uint256,uint256.notice: Emits when additional Metis tokens and rewards are locked for a sequencer.

activeSequencerCount().notice: Returns the number of active sequencers.

activeSequencerIds(uint256).notice: The list of active sequencer agent IDs.

implementation().notice: Use Dealer as a beacon of BeaconProxy for SequencerAgent

l2ChainId().notice: The ID of the L2 chain.

l2Minter().notice: The address of the L2 MetisMinter contract.

l2RewardDispatcher().notice: The address of the L2 RewardDispatcher contract.

lockFor(uint32,address,uint256,bytes).notice: Locks Metis tokens for a new sequencer.

relock().notice: Facilitates the process of augmenting the locked Metis tokens and rewards for all currently active sequencers.

sequencerAgentTemplate().notice: The template contract for sequencer agents.

setActive(uint32,bool).notice: Sets the active status of a sequencer agent.

sumRewards().notice: The sum of rewards of all sequencers.

totalLocked().notice: Returns the total amount of Metis tokens that have been locked for all sequencers.

unlock(uint32).notice: Unlock Metis tokens and terminate the sequencer.

unlockClaim(uint32).notice: The `unlockClaim` function allows a sequencer to claim their Metis tokens after the unlocking waiting period has elapsed.

userdoc.notice: The Dealer contract is responsible for the allocation of Metis tokens from Layer 2 to the LockingPool for sequencers, through sequencer agents.
